item.title: Vanilla
item.description: Illustration of Vanilla planifolia Jacks. ex Andrews from Köhler’s Medizinal-Pflanzen (1887) Vanilla (Vanilla planifolia Jacks. ex Andrews) is a culinary spice from the Orchidaceae family,[^powo] originating in the region(s) of Tropical America.[^van_wyk_culinary_2014] It is used for its fruit, primarily for flavouring; baking; desserts; perfumery; aromatherapy. Its aroma is described as fragrant, sweet, delicious, with a heat index of 1.[^ucla_medicinal_2002] English Arabic Chinese Hungarian vanilla فانيليا 香草 vanília Overview id vanilla species name Vanilla planifolia Jacks.
